data.name: Pigasus VR Media Player
data.description:
Pigasus is a feature rich universal media player that supports networked streaming of media from UPNP/DLNA media servers and Samba shares as well as local playback from your device's internal storage.

Access, setup and enjoy your media the way you want it. Pigasus supports playback of 2D/3D/Surround 360 and 180 videos and images, audio streaming playback and a host of other features optimized for a comfortable VR viewing experience.

Some of Pigasus' features include:
- Playback of all media types (i.e. video, audio and images)
- Supports streaming of network shared media (UPNP/DLNA media servers and Samba shares)
- Playback of 2D, 3D, surround 180 and 360 degree videos and images
- Adjustable re-orientation and zooming of 180/360 surround content
- Subtitle and audio track support for videos

Please see the Pigasus FAQ for additional feature support, information and help:

https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq

translations.long_description:
피가수스는 UPnP / DLNA 미디어 서버 및 삼바 공유의 네트워크 스트리밍 뿐만 아니라 장치의 내부 저장 장치 또는 SD 카드의 로컬 재생을 지원하는 풍부한 기능의 범용 미디어 플레이어입니다.

원하는 방식으로 미디어에 접속하고 설정하고 즐길 수 있습니다. 피가수스는 2D / 3D / 서라운드 360 및 180 비디오 및 이미지 재생, 오디오 스트리밍 재생 및 편안한 가상현실 시청 환경에 최적화 된 다양한 기능을 지원합니다.

피가수스의 기능 중 일부는 다음과 같습니다:
- 모든 미디어 유형 (예 : 비디오, 오디오 및 이미지) 재생
- 네트워크 공유 미디어 (UPNP / DLNA 미디어 서버 및 Samba 공유)의 스트리밍 지원
- 2D, 3D, 서라운드 180 및 360도 비디오 및 이미지 재생
- 180/360 서라운드 컨텐츠의 조정 가능한 재배치 및 확대 / 축소
- 비디오 자막 및 오디오 트랙 지원

추가 기능 지원, 정보 및 도움말을 보려면 피가수스의 질의 응답을 참조하십시오:

https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq-kr

translations.long_description:
Pigasus(ピガサス)は機能豊富なユニバーサルメディアプレイヤーであり、UPNP/DLNAメディアサーバーやSamba共有からのネットワークメディアストリーミング再生、デバイスのストレージやSDカードからのローカル再生をサポートします。

接続、セットアップ後、多様な方法でメディアをお楽しみ下さい。Pigasus(ピガサス)は2D/3D/サラウンド360度、180度動画や画像の再生、音声ストリーミング再生をサポートし、心地良いVR体験のため最適化された機能を備えています。

Pigasus(ピガサス)には以下の機能があります：
-	全ての種類のメディア再生（動画、音声、画像など）
-	ネットワーク共有メディアストリーミングのサポート（UPNP/DLNA メディアサーバー、Samba共有）
-	2D、3D、サラウンド180度、360度動画や画像の再生
-	180度／360度サラウンドコンテンツの方角調整、ズーム調整適応
-	動画の字幕、音声トラックサポート

追加機能サポート、情報、ヘルプに関しましてはPigasus(ピガサス)FAQ(よくある質問）をご参照下さい。
https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq-jp

======================
v4.1.3 - Release Notes 
======================
- Adding support for Quest 3
  + recognize running on Quest 3 devices
  + added Quest 3 controller models
  + enabling support for 120hz refresh when running on Quest 3
- Added some more checks to various internal logic to try to improve overall app stability
- Added recognition of jps files as valid image file

======================
v4.1.3 - Release Notes 
======================
- Adding support for Quest 3
  + recognize running on Quest 3 devices
  + added Quest 3 controller models
  + enabling support for 120hz refresh when running on Quest 3
- Added some more checks to various internal logic to try to improve overall app stability
- Added recognition of jps files as valid image file

======================
v4.1.2 - Release Notes 
======================
- Fixed bug in curved screen view showing black screen when rotated 180 degrees
- Fixed unable to get video orientation information for videos streamed over SMB
- Fixed "default view" and "subtitle encoding" option menus being messed up
- Fixed unable to Favorite local files on headset

======================
v4.1.1 - Release Notes 
======================
- Minor update to fix:
 + files not showing up in SMB folders named with '#' character in them
 + external subtitles not loading for videos played over SMB

======================
v4.1.0 - Release Notes 
======================

New Features
=============
- Added ability to delete files over SMB
- Added 2 new environments, "Pigasus Cinema" and "Sky Bed".
  + The new "Pigasus Cinema" environment is now the default cinema environment. 
  + The old cinema environment can still be selected in the Theaters menu.
- Added support for Playlist files (i.e. m3u and .pls files).
- Added support to stream media from a manually entered url link (e.g. http, rstp or smb etc.)
  + Your milage may vary on none direct links to media files due to how websites hide/encode their media for consumption.
  + Ability to bookmark manually entered url stream links also added
- Added support for IPTV links. 
  + These can either be manually entered via the new url streaming option or as part of a playlist file.
- Added support for RSTP links. 
  + Like IPTV links, these can either manually entered via the new url streaming option or as part of a playlist file.

Functional Changes
==================
- Small improvement to dynamic environment lighting during media playback
- Sync Peripherals now auto connect if detected to be present and connection key exists from previous session
- Screenshot output names now contain title of screen shotted media
- Remapped some controller buttons (hopefully for the better)
  + Play/Pause remapped to controller stick down press (users were previously accidently hitting the side button too easily)
  + Image zoom remapped to double click of controller side button
  + Removed the need to activate screen and vr scene zoom function first. Now always on. We simply just have to push up/down on the controller stick.
  + In app help screen updated to reflect new button mappings.

Bug Fixes
==========
- Fix anonymous SMB logins not working on some linux boxes
- Try to make app more robust/aware of smb connection drops
- Fix small bug where name filtering was not working for folders in dlna

- fix videos streamed over dlna not looking in the "Pigasus/scripts" folder for associated funscripts
- added support to recognize funscript links provided by dlna servers (note: currently only xbvr dlna media server will provide funscript links and only if the funscripts have not been "matched")

======================
v4.0.0 - Release Notes 
======================

New Features
=============
- Brought back Zoom and Height adjustment in 180/360 views. It now works with the timewarp layer!
- Volume slider added to player menu to allow to control headset volume inside of the app
- Media filtering support added. We can now filter by media type or by name
- Added button to remove SMB login. SMB login that has been saved is now marked with a star to indicate so.
- Screenshot feature added.
- Added ability to delete locally stored files
- Added option to default view forward to gaze or fixed forward when entering 180/360 views
- Added option to disable/enable menu sounds
- Added 200 degree fisheye video/image support (files tagged with "_MKX200" in their name will be auto recognized as 200 degree fisheye videos/images)
- Added experimental support for synchronized interactive peripherals (only The Handy is supported for now).

Bug Fixes
=========
- Fixed next/prev media accidently triggering when scrubbing
- Fix videos not playing back over SMB when username or password has "@" character in them

Functional Changes
==================
- UI has had a big overhaul
- Updated menu sounds
- Changed menu scrolling to smooth scrolling
- Added haptic feedback to controller when going over menu ui
- We now auto resume playing media if previously playing when headset is put back on instead of showing media selection menu.
- Media now pauses when Oculus overlay menu is present and auto resumes again if previously was playing.
- Removed "Use Legacy Renderer" option as it is no longer needed since zoom and height now work with timewarp layer in 180/360 views.
- AB-loop setting on a video is now remembered
- Image zoom/panning now resets on each image load
- Image zoom, now zooms to center of the image
- Updated to using latest Oculus Mobile SDK
- Updated libvlc build to latest
- Updated smb connection lib to latest

Please visit the Pigasus FAQ for additional info and help: https://hanginghatstudios.com/pigasus-faq

======================

======================

New Features and Improvements
=============================
- added new Advanced settings screen with following settings:
  + option to allow turning off of device refresh rate to framerate syncing.
  + option to set default viewing mode of image and video media when file tagging for auto recognition is not used.
  + moved ipd and "use eyebuffer rendering..." options into this advanced settings.
- removed "tap to recenter" auto pop and functionality when we look outside the bounds of the Void screen. This is replaced with:
  + manual recenter screen to gaze option, found under the player options screen.
  + support for controller based re-orientation of Void screen by holding trigger down for 2 seconds or more
- reduce white levels slightly of menus and subtitle text so they are easier on the eyes on Oculus Quest 2 screens. Not so much glare.
- updated internal video decoder library to most up to date build.

===========================

- optimize thumbnail loading to reduce oom issues on large image files.

- fix incorrect previous image bug when manually going to previous image during a slideshow or immediately after we stop a slideshow.
- fix thumbnails not auto generating for videos over 4k.
- fix cached thumbnails not accounting for duplicate names in different file locations.
- fix issue with some MPO images showing as skewed due to width info in MPO header being off by a pixel.
- fix auto play via config file option sometimes not kicking in for image slideshows.
- fix auto detect view mode by file tag not kicking in for images when config file settings tells it to auto play.

- removed "tap to recenter" auto pop and functionality when we look outside the bounds of the Void screen. This is replaced with:
  + manual recenter screen to gaze option, found under the player options screen.
  + support for controller based re-orientation of Void screen by holding trigger down for 2 seconds or more
- reduce white levels slightly of menus and subtitle text so they are easier on the eyes on Oculus Quest 2 screens. Not so much glare.
- updated internal video decoder library to most up to date build.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations
===========================
- optimize image memory management and loading for better and more reliable loading of very very large images.
- optimize thumbnail loading to reduce oom issues on large image files.
- fix chronological sorting of folders for smb and local folders.
- fix incorrect previous image bug when manually going to previous image during a slideshow or immediately after we stop a slideshow.
- fix thumbnails not auto generating for videos over 4k.
- fix cached thumbnails not accounting for duplicate names in different file locations.
- fix issue with some MPO images showing as skewed due to width info in MPO header being off by a pixel.
- fix auto play via config file option sometimes not kicking in for image slideshows.
- fix auto detect view mode by file tag not kicking in for images when config file settings tells it to auto play.

===============================
v.3.3.1 Release notes: Minor release
===============================
- Fix junction links no longer being recognized in SMB shares
- Revert SMB3.1.1. support for further testing. Was potentially causing socket error issues when trying to open photos on some Mac OS variants
- Revert internal libvlc video decoder library back to using old one for further testing as some people were reporting playback issues over SMB with new libvlc video decoder library update. Possibly related to the SMB3.1.1 support that also had to be reverted.

===========================
Previous v.3.3.0 Release notes
===========================

New Features
============
- 180, 360 and 180 fisheye images and videos are now rendered to the spherical timewarp layer for better image clarity.
- Added option in "Player Settings" to re-enable/fallback to the legacy eye buffer rendering mode (see note 1 below).
- Device refresh rate now auto syncs as best it can to video frame rate for smoother playback (most noticeable during long panning shots).
- Added recognition of .iso files as valid video files.
- Added support for SMB3.1.1
- Updated internal libvlc video decoding library to latest build to take advantage of all updates/bug fixes done to the library over the last year.
- Added support to manually specify optional port number to use in SMB connections.

Quest2 specific updates
=======================
- App should now be fully aware if its running on Quest2 or Quest1.
- Enable 90Hz refresh mode as default if running on Quest2.
- Show Quest2 controller model if running on Quest2.
- Show Quest2 controller help screen if running on Quest2.

Bug fixes
=========
- Fixed small bug with subtitle scale slider.
- Fixed small gui bug in SMB login screen.
- Fix video rotation detection bug for smb shared videos.
- Other misc minor bug fixes.

Note 1: Zooming and height adjustment in VR 180/360 mode is temporarily removed to support spherical timewarp layers as this layer uses in infinite radius which negates out any zooming and height adjustment capabilities. However, the legacy eye buffer method of rendering 180/360 views can be re-enabled again via the "Use legacy eye buffer... " option in the Player Settings menu, which will then also re-enable the zooming and height adjustment feature again when in 180/360 view mode.

Note 2: Those using their own custom build of the libvlc library should still be able to continue using their current custom build without any side effects. However, it is highly recommended to update your personal libvlc build to be built from the latest libvlc code base linked from the Pigasus FAQ so as to take advantage of any updates and/or bug fixes made to the library over the last year and if nothing else, to ensure better sync to what Pigasus expects from the library.
